Welcome to Yayyoo Fitness Center MMA

Established in 2018 by professional Muay Thai fighter Yeison Berdugo, Yayyoo Fitness Center MMA is a full-service fitness center and fight gym. Conveniently located in historic Pawtucket, RI it is only minutes from US-95.

Adult Classes

Our adult programs are tailored to all experience and fitness levels. Come as you are and tell us what goals you have for the future. We'd love to be your partner in smashing them!

Youth Classes

Our youth programs are focussed on keeping kids active and providing life skills. Top priority is always building respect, discipline, leadership skills, confidence, focus, and control.

Group and Private Classes Available.

  • Muay Thai (Youth & Adult)
  • Cardio Kickboxing
  • Yayyoo Calisthenics
  • Boxing
